title: All the bookmarks are gone. I can't restore it.
content: All saved bookmarks are gone. It is not possible to restore the backups, it gives an error. What happened? What should I do about it?
creator: margaritakorneva98

title: Incorrect display on BBC weather site
content:
Morning all

FF 86.01.1 (64) on Win 10 Pro AMD processor.

FF used to display the BBC weather site as shown on attached SM.jpg , taken on Sea Monkey.

It now displays the attached image FF.jpg where the text on the 'Today' tab is abbreviated.

FF still displays correctly on a second PC running on an Intel processor.

Both PC's were recently updated to the latest Microsoft versions (OS build 18363.1440)

Any suggestions as to why this is happening?

Regards

Dave Johnson
creator: djwarminster

title: Firefox Sync 3 devices
content:
Hi. I want to synchronize Firefox with 3 devices. I have already synchronized device 1. I want this data I use it on the other devices too. Firefox is already installed on devices 2 and 3. Do I have to delete the bookmarks on these 2 devices, before I sync? I just want the bookmarks from device 1. Many greetings


Hallo. Ich möchte Firefox mit 3 Geräten synchronisieren. Gerät 1 habe ich schon synchronisiert. Diese Daten möchte ich auf den anderen Geräten auch verwenden. Auf den Geräten 2 und 3 ist schon ein Firefox installiert. Muss ich auf diesen 2 Geräten die Lesezeichen löschen, bevor ich synchronisiere? Ich möchte die Lesezeichen nur von Gerät 1 verwenden. Viele Grüße
creator: wolke.layher

title: HTML5 y Firefox
content: Firefox no me deja abrir archivos HTML aunque los tengo configurados para que se abran con el navegador Firefox. Me está pasando en un iMac con Big Sur. Sin embargo, en un MacBook sí me abre los mismos archivos. Gracias

title: Nastavení Nového panelu
content:
Zdravím. Je možné nějakým způsobem, při otevření " Nového panelu" nastavit mnou vybranou webovou stránku, nebo jsou jen možnosti " Výchozí domovskou stránku Firefoxu " a " Prázdnou stránku "

Díky.

creator: r.lasztuwka

title: Blank browser after update
content: After I updated my browser to the latest version and opened it, everything went blank. No tabs, no history, no bookmarks, nothing. I didn't have a profile set up and am unable to import any bookmarks or anything since I didn't do an export beforehand. What can I do? How can I restore everything, is there a way? I even tried to restore my computer to a date of 2 weeks beforehand and it didn't help. It had all my uni work and such, I'm getting really desperate.
creator: sojkova.ter

title: Firefox Master Password not working in Windows 10
content: I have 2 OS's on my computer (on different drives) - in W7 my Firefox Master Password works normally but when I try to open Firefox when using W10 the same password DOESN'T work. I'd rather not lose all the stored info by doing a reset of it on the W10 OS. Is there another way to resolve it?
creator: piikea

title: css not working correctly in mozila firefox
content: When I develop a website then CSS is not working in Mozilla Firefox and it shows 0 rule applied but CSS is applied in chrome and IE but not shown in Mozilla
creator: seteve_jhone

title: Firefox file explorer no longer shows "recent files"
content:
Normally when I open the file explorer in firefox to either save or upload an image or file from or to my computer, it shows the "recent files" folder under my quick access menu.

This is still visible elsewhere, in my normal windows explorer, but seems to have disappeared from Firefox itself.

The other pinned items still show up so I am not sure why it's gone or how to get it to show up again, and googling for help is somewhat difficult as I mostly get results that are proving to be too non-specific to narrow down. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: eiedail

title: Screen tearing while scrolling. Started with FF v85
content:
I noticed ever since I updated to FF ver 85 I started seeing screen tearing when scrolling. This is most noticeable when scrolling through a list of videos or pictures. This only happens on Fire Fox. I do not experience this problem on Chrome. I have already disabled Hardware Acceleration. Made no difference. I'm currently on FF version 86.

Anything else I can try to resolve this issue?
creator: mrblzdaily

title: Can right-click also show "Find in this page" as an option? (suggestion)
content:
I do a lot of looking at websites and then finding a particular word or phrase in a webpage. My Ctrl-F is remapped by my audio software so I can't use that key combination. Right now I move my touchpad cursor to the top right with the three bars, click that, and choose "Find in This Page...". It would be great if right-clicking in a page would show that as one of the options, as "Save Page as..." is. I rarely save a page but very often search within a page.

Thanks and please keep up the great work!

M.A.
creator: markadams707

title: Can't Access IRS Get Payment Page
content: I cannot access the IRS.Gov Get Payments page with FIREFOX but CAN access it with Microsoft Edge; why is that?

title: bookmarks don't work now...
content: I recently updated my bookmarks b/c after the latest update, most of mine disappeared. I set everything back up and it worked for a day. Then, I left my browser up for two days without closing out and when I came back to my PC, the links don't work. The favicons are now not showing either anymore. I've looked online but didn't see any instructions I felt confident to follow in order to fix. Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks, Alex
creator: lohaaj
